error_file_not_loaded_try_again: Error: File not loaded. Try again.
info_no_tags_found_try_edit: No tags found or file type not fully supported. You can try editing.
error_processing_music_file_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while processing your music file.
error_session_expired_resend_audio: Error: Session expired or file is missing. Please resend the audio file.
error_session_expired_start_over: Error: Session expired or file is missing. Please start over by resending the file.
error_file_context_lost_resend_audio: Error: File context lost. Please resend the audio file.
prompt_send_album_art_or_cancel: Please send a new image for the album art, or /cancel to keep the current art.
error_not_an_image_send_photo_or_cancel: That doesn't look like an image. Please send a photo for the album art, or use /cancel.
info_new_album_art_received_apply_on_sav: New album art received. It will be applied when you 'Save Changes'.
error_processing_album_art: An error occurred while processing the album art.
prompt_try_album_art_again_or_continue: Please try sending the album art again or continue editing other tags.
error_file_context_lost_or_missing_resen: Error: No file context found or file missing. Please resend the file.
warning_could_not_set_album_art: Warning: Could not set new album art: {error_message}
info_action_not_implemented_or_unavailab: This action is not yet implemented or not available in the current context.
error_session_ended_send_audio_again: Session expired or context is missing. Please send the audio file again.
error_unknown_command_during_edit: Unknown command or message. If you're editing tags, please send the tag value or use /cancel. Otherwise, send an audio file to start.
error_original_tags_not_found: Error: Original tags not found. Please try again.
error_need_title_or_artist_for_mb_search: Need at least a title or artist to search MusicBrainz.
error_searching_musicbrainz: An error occurred while searching MusicBrainz: {error_message}
info_no_results_musicbrainz: No results found on MusicBrainz for this track.
error_mb_results_display_error: Found results but could not display them. Please try again.
prompt_select_match_musicbrainz: Please select a match from MusicBrainz:
error_could_not_retrieve_selection: Error: Could not retrieve selection. Please try again.
info_autofill_cancelled_returning_to_edi: Auto-fill cancelled. Returning to tag editor.
error_file_path_not_found_resend_audio: Error: File path not found. Please resend the audio file.
error_acoustid_ffmpeg_missing: AcoustID Error: {error_message}. Ensure FFmpeg/fpcalc is installed.
info_no_match_acoustid_or_error: No match found on AcoustID or an error occurred.
error_acoustid_matches_no_details: Found AcoustID matches, but could not retrieve details. Please try again.
error_fetching_mb_details_for_acoustid: An error occurred fetching details from MusicBrainz for AcoustID match: {error_message}
info_acoustid_matching_cancelled_returni: AcoustID matching cancelled. Returning to tag editor.
error_cannot_determine_song_details_rest: Error: Cannot determine song details. Please restart the editing process.
error_need_title_and_artist_for_lyrics: Need both title and artist to search for lyrics.
error_searching_genius: An error occurred while searching Genius: {error_message}
info_no_lyrics_found_genius: No lyrics found on Genius for '{song_title}' by '{song_artist}'.
batch_edit_send_files_prompt: Please send the audio files you want to edit.
batch_edit_done_sending_command: When you are done sending all files, type {command}.
batch_edit_done_sending_command_reminder: Send more files or type {command} when done.
batch_edit_file_download_error: Error downloading file. Please try sending it again.
batch_edit_no_files_received: No files received for batch editing.
batch_edit_select_operation: Please select the batch operation to perform:
batch_edit_cancelled: Batch editing cancelled. All collected files have been discarded.
batch_edit_provide_value_prompt: You chose to set {tag_name} for all files. Please send the value for {tag_name}:
batch_edit_confirmation_prompt: You are about to set {operation_name} to '{new_value}' for {num_files} file(s). Confirm?
batch_edit_error_missing_context: Error: Batch editing session data is missing. Please start over.
batch_edit_error_sending_file: Error: Could not send the processed file: {file_name}.
batch_edit_completed_summary:
Batch edit complete!
Successfully processed: {processed_count} file(s).
Errors: {error_count} file(s) out of {total_files}.
